com.tineye.services

Class TinEyeServiceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tineye.services.TinEyeServiceRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MatchEngineRequest, MetadataRequest

    public class TinEyeServiceRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to call the TinEye Services API methods that are common across all of the TinEye Services APIs (excluding the TinEye Commercial API).

    Copyright (C) 2011-2016 Id√©e Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TinEyeServiceRequest(java.lang.String apiURL)
      Construct a TinEyeServiceRequest instance to issue HTTP requests to a specific TinEye Services API.
      TinEyeServiceRequest(java.lang.String apiURL, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Construct a TinEyeServiceRequest instance to issue HTTP requests to a specific TinEye Services API using HTTP basic authentication.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.sf.json.JSONObject count()
      Get count of all the images in the hosted image collection.
      net.sf.json.JSONObject delete(java.lang.String[] filepaths)
      Delete images from the hosted image collection.
      net.sf.json.JSONObject list(int offset, int limit)
      Get a list of images present in the hosted image collection.
      net.sf.json.JSONObject ping()
      Check if the API server is running.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TinEyeServiceRequest

        public TinEyeServiceRequest(java.lang.String apiURL)
                     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                            java.net.URISyntaxException,
                            TinEyeServiceException
        Construct a TinEyeServiceRequest instance to issue HTTP requests to a specific TinEye Services API.
        Parameters:
        apiURL - The URL for a specific TinEye Services API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the apiURL is null
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the apiURL is not a valid URL
        TinEyeServiceException - If the apiURL does not end with /rest/

      • TinEyeServiceRequest

        public TinEyeServiceRequest(java.lang.String apiURL,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
                     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                            java.net.URISyntaxException,
                            TinEyeServiceException
        Construct a TinEyeServiceRequest instance to issue HTTP requests to a specific TinEye Services API using HTTP basic authentication.
        Parameters:
        apiURL - The URL for a specific TinEye Services API.
        username - The username for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to the TinEye Services API.
        password - The password for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to the TinEye Services API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the apiURL is null
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the apiURL is not a valid URL
        TinEyeServiceException - If the apiURL does not end with /rest/

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public net.sf.json.JSONObject delete(java.lang.String[] filepaths)
                              throws TinEyeServiceException
        Delete images from the hosted image collection.

        Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

        • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
        • method: delete
        • result: Empty array
        • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok
        Parameters:
        filepaths - Filepaths of images to delete as returned by a search or list call.
        Returns:
        The API JSON response with image deletion status.
        Throws:
        TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API delete request or parsing the response.

      • count

        public net.sf.json.JSONObject count()
                             throws TinEyeServiceException
        Get count of all the images in the hosted image collection.

        Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

        • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
        • method: count
        • result: Array with one entry which is the image count
        • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok
        Returns:
        The API JSON response with the hosted image collection image count.
        Throws:
        TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API count request or parsing the response.

      • list

        public net.sf.json.JSONObject list(int offset,
                          int limit)
                            throws TinEyeServiceException
        Get a list of images present in the hosted image collection.

        Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

        • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
        • method: list
        • result: Array with list of collection image filepaths
        • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok
        Parameters:
        offset - Offset from start of search results to return (starting from 0).
        limit - Maximum number of images to list.
        Returns:
        The API JSON response with list of collection images.
        Throws:
        TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API list request or parsing the response.

      • ping

        public net.sf.json.JSONObject ping()
                            throws TinEyeServiceException
        Check if the API server is running.

        Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

        • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
        • method: ping
        • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok
        Returns:
        The API JSON response with the server status.
        Throws:
        TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API ping request or parsing the response.
